questions.question: My parents are out. So I have to ..... my baby brother.
Do you mind if I switch the television on?
You should ..... your cap when entering a religious building.

The best definition for a vein is:
options: A blood vessel carrying blood going to the heart
A blood vessel carrying blue blood
A blood vessel carrying blood away from the heart
questions.answer: A blood vessel carrying blood going to the heart

questions.question: ..... the lawn! It’s forbidden to walk on it!
